mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JOB_QRTZ_TRIGGER_REGISTRY WHERE update_time < sysdate-1/24/60/60*#{timeout}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_QRTZ_TRIGGER_REGISTRY(id, registry_group , registry_key , registry_value, update_time) VALUES(JOB_QRTZ_TRIGGER_REGISTRY_ID.nextval, #{registryGroup} , #{registryKey} , #{registryValue}, sysdate)
